segment.source: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates
segment.target: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates

segment.source: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates
segment.target: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates

segment.source: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates
segment.target: Enable zero-rating (no-charge) downloads for device updates

segment.source: Mobile Operators (MOs) can enable devices to receive updates without being charged for data usage by adding the Windows Update servers to their list of zero-rated sites.
segment.target: Mobile Operators (MOs) can enable devices to receive updates without being charged for data usage by adding the Windows Update servers to their list of zero-rated sites.

segment.source: This method only allows updates from the Windows Update servers to be zero-rated.
segment.target: This method only allows updates from the Windows Update servers to be zero-rated.

segment.source: Other network traffic, such as store updates or updates for devices using Internet Connection Sharing (ICS) are not zero-rated.
segment.target: Other network traffic, such as store updates or updates for devices using Internet Connection Sharing (ICS) are not zero-rated.

segment.source: Enabling zero-rating
segment.target: Enabling zero-rating

segment.source: Add the following two URLs to your network as zero-rated sites:
segment.target: Add the following two URLs to your network as zero-rated sites:

segment.source: http://wp.download.windowsupdate.com
segment.target: http://wp.download.windowsupdate.com

segment.source: http://wp.ds.download.windowsupdate.com
segment.target: http://wp.ds.download.windowsupdate.com

segment.source: Once those URLs are zero-rated, there are no more actions to take to get zero rating in place.
segment.target: Once those URLs are zero-rated, there are no more actions to take to get zero rating in place.

segment.source: It will be effective for alldevices (both operator variant and open market devices).
segment.target: It will be effective for alldevices (both operator variant and open market devices).

segment.source: Testing zero-rating
segment.target: Testing zero-rating

segment.source: To test zero rating, you'll need to trigger an update over cellular which is small enough to stay under the limit defined by your MO.
segment.target: To test zero rating, you'll need to trigger an update over cellular which is small enough to stay under the limit defined by your MO.

segment.source: For example, an MO may limit zero-rating downloads to 100MB or less.
segment.target: For example, an MO may limit zero-rating downloads to 100MB or less.

segment.source: Start with a retail device that's ready for an update.
segment.target: Start with a retail device that's ready for an update.

segment.source: Remove the SIM card (if it has one).
segment.target: Remove the SIM card (if it has one).

segment.source: Check how much data usage it has associated with it for the current period.
segment.target: Check how much data usage it has associated with it for the current period.

segment.source: Consult with the MO for specific instructions.
segment.target: Consult with the MO for specific instructions.

segment.source: Disable all Wi-Fi options:
segment.target: Disable all Wi-Fi options:

segment.source: In Settings: Wi-Fi:
segment.target: In Settings: Wi-Fi:

segment.source: Change Wi-Fi networking to Off.
segment.target: Change Wi-Fi networking to Off.

segment.source: Change Turn Wi-Fi back on to Manually.
segment.target: Change Turn Wi-Fi back on to Manually.

segment.source: Tap Wi-Fi sense, and change Connect to Wi-Fi hotspots to Off.
segment.target: Tap Wi-Fi sense, and change Connect to Wi-Fi hotspots to Off.

segment.source: In SettingsUpdate & recoveryPhone update, clear the Automatically download updates if my data settings allow it checkbox.
segment.target: In SettingsUpdate & recoveryPhone update, clear the Automatically download updates if my data settings allow it checkbox.

segment.source: Force the update through the cellular connection:
segment.target: Force the update through the cellular connection:

segment.source: Allow the device to boot up.
segment.target: Allow the device to boot up.

segment.source: Turn off the device, and then insert a SIM card associated with a data plan.
segment.target: Turn off the device, and then insert a SIM card associated with a data plan.

segment.source: Connect the device to power again, boot it up and sign in with your account.
segment.target: Connect the device to power again, boot it up and sign in with your account.

segment.source: Search for the update: SettingsUpdate & recoveryPhone update.
segment.target: Search for the update: SettingsUpdate & recoveryPhone update.

segment.source: You should be able to force the update through the cellular connection.
segment.target: You should be able to force the update through the cellular connection.

segment.source: Note, you may see a warning saying that you may be charged for the download:
segment.target: Note, you may see a warning saying that you may be charged for the download:

segment.source: screenshot: ready to download using mobile data
segment.target: screenshot: ready to download using mobile data

segment.source: After the download completes, check the data plan usage to see if the device was charged for the update.
segment.target: After the download completes, check the data plan usage to see if the device was charged for the update.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Update
segment.target: Update
